original: Goldberg Ligner & Shyster was founded on the ideal that no man is beyond judgement.  Our firm has endeavored to seek out corruption and vice in the highest echelons of society.
translated: Goldberg Ligner & Shyster律师事务所的理念是没有人可以凌驾于审判之上。我们的事务所致力于搜寻社会高层的腐败和罪恶。

original: Coming from founder Tom Goldberg's dream to level the playing field, GL&S has amassed one of the most impressive records in the legal industry.
translated: 怀揣着创始人Tom Goldberg创造公平竞争环境的初衷，GLS已经在法律行业积累了数一数二的记录。

original: Our firm has successfully litigated against CEOs, politicians, priests, community leaders, and charities.  GL&S believe that corruption is always there, you just have to look for it.
translated: 我们事务所成功起诉过CEO，政客，牧师，社区领袖和慈善机构。GLS相信腐败永远都有，需要的是一双发现腐败的眼睛。

original: GL&S, All Rights Reserved . Privacy Statement . Contact Info
